1:
CIRCULAR 35 / 2000 
 
 
SUB: PHYSICAL  CHECKING LADY PASSENGERS 
 
 
It has been brought to the notice of this Bureau that at certain airports physical 
checking of hand baggage of lady passengers whenever considered necessary by APS staff is 
not done by a female security officer.  Rather a male security officer performs this task.  In 
the interest of courtesy it is imperative that physical checking offhand baggage of female 
passenger should be undertaken by lady security officer only.  All concerned may be suitably 
briefed to ensure this aspect. 
 
 (R.K.Singh) 
ADDL.COMMISSIONER OF SECURITY (CA) 
 
NO.CAS-5(11)/98-DIV-I 
Dated : 20.10.2000
